channel.title: Non wildy zones,somebody please explain this too me =)
channel.description: ok i no how to get to it but i need somebody to explain wat coordinate is for what lol if you get wat i mean, (absX >= 2954 && absX <= 3004 && absY >= 3679 && absY <=3709 ) || ^^ ^^ ^^ ^^ im trying to make a area non wildy, so would i have to stand in 1 spot for a certain coord or for 2 coords hmm somebody please explain this non wildy thing to me lolz thanks!

item.title: Non wildy zones,somebody please explain this too me =)
item.dc:creator: @Project_Gamma Project Gamma
item.description:
@Project_Gamma wrote:

||(absX >=XXXX && absX <=XXXX && absY >=YYYY  && absY <=YYYY )|| 

       ^                   ^            ^                ^
    south west       north east     south west    north east
cornor            cornor                  cornor             cornor

item.title: Non wildy zones,somebody please explain this too me =)
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

its a grid system so it would be anywhere above 2954 for the x axis and below 3004 for the x axis and also anywhere above 3679 for the y axis and below 3709 so basically it forms a big square of safe zone using coords
